title: Grilled Salmon Steak
description: Succulent salmon steak seasoned with herbs and grilled to perfection. Served with a side of roasted vegetables.

title: Vegetarian Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a flavorful tamarind sauce. Garnished with lime and cilantro.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Indulge in the rich and gooey goodness of our chocolate lava cake. Served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
